title: Once again, patcher breaks my experience.
body:
Okay, I have gone through the toolbox. I've uninstalled, reinstalled, switched regions, left it alone, tried everything possible. And oncve again, it comes up "Update failed: unexpected error has occured". When I try to repair, the same error comes up. 
Now, when I go to try, it iwll go up to 995.. and 0 files scanned. What is going on? What fixes do people have? i've already done the S_OK file attmept, the switching server, and everything else commonly given as an asnwer.

replies.body: Running into issues patching under the circumstances you've mentioned are typically caused by League not being provided the right system permissions to run properly. Because League interfaces with a lot of files and software packages outside the League installation directory, it's important to have proper system permissions. Our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) goes over the most common solutions for this. Let me know if this helped.
